Title: Allows persons in recovery to have a distinguishing mark printed on their license for cases of medical emergencies
Summary: Allows persons in recovery to have a distinguishing mark printed on their driver's license for cases of medical emergencies.
LawCode: Amd ยง504, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to allowing persons in recovery to have a distinguishing mark printed on their driver's license for cases of medical emergencies
